name: UAC Bypass Using WOW64 Logger DLL Hijack
description: Detects the pattern of UAC Bypass using a WoW64 logger DLL hijack (UACMe 30)
note: **Detection Rule without Regex for better understanding. Be careful, this way is case sensitive:**`(process.executable:*\:\\Windows\\SysWOW64\\* AND winlog.event_data.GrantedAccess:0x1fffff AND winlog.event_data.CallTrace:UNKNOWN\(0000000000000000\)|UNKNOWN\(0000000000000000\)|*)`
